page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: The farming in this area is mixed.Some arable,some hill and some dairy farming.The animals kept are pigs, sheep and cattle. The main breeds are: Charollias, Friesian and Aberdeen Angus.Sheep: Black-face, Texel and Cheviots. Pigs: Landrace, Large-white. Most of the fields are rotational but there are the odd fields which are to steep for ploughing, so they are left fallow. some fields are very stoney. They prepare the soil by ploughing then planting the seeds. The crops grown now are: Oil seed rape, barley, grass,wheat,oats,potatoes and turnips. The newest crop is oil seed rape. It is used for making cooking oil.The common types of tractors are Mercedes Benz and Ford.the main machines used are the tractor,combine harvester, ploughs,seed drill,discs,rollers, manure spreaders and muck spreaders.
